attributes.action: make petrol and diesel pricing in whole pence and stop the decimal point in fuel pricing at the pumps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You cannot pay .9p as the lowest figure you can pay is 1 pence so why should petrol forecourts advertise fuel at 105.9p when .9 is not a legal tender.Join this petition to lobby the Prime Minister and Government to make forecourts advertise the legal price you pay for fuel.e.g. Whole Pence.
